Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert artist and choreographer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to design an art piece for you.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a design for art performance for this artist using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite color?
QApair.Answer: My favorite color is baby blue.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite season?
QApair.Answer: My favorite season is spring.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite flower?
QApair.Answer: My favorite flower is a chamomile.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite animal?
QApair.Answer: My favorite animal is the blue whale.

QApair.Question: What style of art do you prefer?
QApair.Answer: I prefer abstract art.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite music genre?
QApair.Answer: My favorite music genre is Jazz.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite food?
QApair.Answer: My favorite food is sushi.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite hobby?
QApair.Answer: My favorite hobby is dancing.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing to do?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing to do is travel.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite place to go?
QApair.Answer: My favorite place to go is the mountains.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite time of day?
QApair.Answer: My favorite time of day is sunrise time.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite weather?
QApair.Answer: My favorite weather is sunny and bright.

Instances.Output: The performance will be an abstract art piece that will be set to Jazz music. The piece will be baby blue in color and will be inspired by the chamomile flower. It will be set in the spring season and will feature the blue whale as the main animal. The piece will be about travel and will be set in different places around the world. The piece will be performed at sunrise time and will be set in sunny and bright weather.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite color?
QApair.Answer: My favorite color is yellow and orange.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite season?
QApair.Answer: My favorite season is summer where nights are hot and dry.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite activity?
QApair.Answer: My favorite activity is swimming because it is very refreshing and it is a great workout. I also like cycling around the city.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite place to be?
QApair.Answer: My favorite place to be is at the beach where I can relax and enjoy the sound and smell of the ocean. But in general I like to go anywhere that is new for me.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite food?
QApair.Answer: My favorite food is pizza and spicy chicken wings.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite music?
QApair.Answer: My favorite music is rap and hip hop.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite animal?
QApair.Answer: My favorite animal is a wild cats because they are so powerful and majestic but also cute.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing to do?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing to do is to be creative in any way possible. Whether it is painting, drawing, or dancing, I love to express myself through art.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite time of day?
QApair.Answer: My favorite time of day is night because the air is usually very calm and still.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite place?
QApair.Answer: My favorite place is the city because there is so much to do and see.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing to wear?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing to wear is sport wear because it makes me feel freedom in walking and moving my body.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing to do for fun is to play sports and go to the gym or doing any physical ativity.

Instances.Output: The art performance will be a free style dance to hip hop and rap music. The dancer will be wearing sportswear that is yellow and orange. The performance will take place at night in the city.

QApair.Answer: I like all food that exist in the world.

QApair.Answer: I like to dance and listen to music.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing to do?
QApair.Answer: I like staying at home doing nothing.

QApair.Answer: I doing have a favorite place.

QApair.Answer: I like all animals.

QApair.Answer: I don't care about clothes.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite season?

QApair.Question: What is your favorite movie?
QApair.Answer: I don't have a favorite movie.

Instances.Output: This art performance will be a painting and sculpture exhibition inspired by the artist's favorite colors, type of art, and artist. The exhibition will feature a variety of paintings and sculptures in different colors, styles, and techniques. There will also be a live performance by the artist in which they will create a new painting or sculpture inspired by their favorite song.
